Package io.micronaut.web.router

Interface Route

All Known Subinterfaces:
ErrorRoute, ResourceRoute, StatusRoute, UriRoute
public interface Route
Represents a Route definition constructed by a RouteBuilder.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
See Also:
